tasks.title: Add core type declarations (GameState, Intent, Event) in packages/core/src/types.ts.
Define minimal domain types in packages/core/src/types.ts: PlayerId, Coord, PieceId.
Expand GameState in packages/core/src/types.ts to include: players (2), activePlayer, and a board snapshot (pieces with coord + owner).
Convert Intent into a discriminated union in packages/core/src/types.ts: EndTurn | Move (pieceId, to). Keep it minimal.
Convert Event into a discriminated union in packages/core/src/types.ts: TurnEnded | PieceMoved. Keep it minimal.

Add applyIntent(state, intent) function in packages/core/src/applyIntent.ts that returns { state, events }. Implement EndTurn and Move only. applyIntent.ts is in the same folder as types.ts. Import types from ./types
Add a tiny unit test (or script) that runs applyIntent for Move and EndTurn and asserts resulting state/events. Keep it minimal; no new frameworks.
